description:
Presenting "The Shadows", Part I of the *epic* two-part voice drama project "Dawn of Time" by hololive English -Myth-!

Five tales, one dawn, and a bucket of fried chicken!
What happens when Myth gathers at KFP after hours? 

Secrets spilled, laughter echoed, and... 
wait, is that Ame fiddling with a papier-mâché cannon!?

Join the wildest midnight feast as Myth serves up their untold stories!
Ready for some mythical revelations? Grab your headphones and dive in!

P.S. No tentacles were harmed in the making of this drama. Probably.
 
 
 Please share with us your thoughts about these voices using the hashtag, "#MythVoiceDrama_DoT".
 And share your beautiful fanart under the hashtag "#holoVoice_Art"!
 
 Key Visual Illustration: AkiZero

* The world-building and settings in this project do not affect the official lore or canon.

▷ Date of Sale

title: 【New Voice Drama】 From Shadows to Light: KFP After Hours with #holomyth
